verses.text: In thee, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, do I put my \w trust|strong="H2620"\w*: let me \w never|strong="H0408"\w* be put to \w confusion|strong="H0954"\w*.

\w Deliver|strong="H5337"\w* me in thy \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*, and cause me to \w escape|strong="H6403"\w*: \w incline|strong="H5186"\w* thine \w ear|strong="H0241"\w* unto me, and \w save|strong="H3467"\w* me.

Be thou my \w strong|strong="H6697"\w* \w habitation|strong="H4583"\w*, whereunto I may \w continually|strong="H8548"\w* \w resort|strong="H0935"\w*: thou hast given \w commandment|strong="H6680"\w* to \w save|strong="H3467"\w* me; for thou \add art\add* my \w rock|strong="H5553"\w* and my \w fortress|strong="H4686"\w*.\f + \fr 71.3 \ft Be…: Heb. Be thou to me for a rock of habitation\f*

\w Deliver|strong="H6403"\w* me, O my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, out of the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*, out of the \w hand|strong="H3709"\w* of the \w unrighteous|strong="H5765"\w* and cruel \w man|strong="H2556"\w*.

For thou \add art\add* my \w hope|strong="H8615"\w*, O \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*: \add thou art\add* my \w trust|strong="H4009"\w* from my \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*.

By thee have I been holden \w up|strong="H5564"\w* from the \w womb|strong="H0990"\w*: thou art he that \w took|strong="H1491"\w* me out of my \w mother’s|strong="H0517"\w* \w bowels|strong="H4578"\w*: my \w praise|strong="H8416"\w* \add shall be\add* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w* of thee.
I am as a \w wonder|strong="H4159"\w* unto \w many|strong="H7227"\w*; but thou \add art\add* my \w strong|strong="H5797"\w* \w refuge|strong="H4268"\w*.
Let my \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* be \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* \add with\add* thy \w praise|strong="H8416"\w* \add and with\add* thy \w honour|strong="H8597"\w* all the \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

Cast me not \w off|strong="H7993"\w* in the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* of old \w age|strong="H2209"\w*; \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* me not when my \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* \w faileth|strong="H3615"\w*.

For mine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* \w speak|strong="H0559"\w* against me; and they that lay \w wait|strong="H8104"\w* for my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* take \w counsel|strong="H3289"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*,\f + \fr 71.10 \ft lay…: Heb. watch, or, observe\f*

\w Saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* him: \w persecute|strong="H7291"\w* and \w take|strong="H8610"\w* him; for \add there is\add* none to \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \add him\add*.
O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, be not \w far|strong="H7368"\w* from me: O my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, make \w haste|strong="H2363"\w* for my \w help|strong="H5833"\w*.

Let them be \w confounded|strong="H0954"\w* \add and\add* \w consumed|strong="H3615"\w* that are \w adversaries|strong="H7853"\w* to my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*; let them be \w covered|strong="H5844"\w* \add with\add* \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w* and \w dishonour|strong="H3639"\w* that \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* my \w hurt|strong="H7451"\w*.
But I will \w hope|strong="H3176"\w* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w*, and will yet \w praise|strong="H8416"\w* thee \w more|strong="H3254"\w* and \w more|strong="H3254"\w*.

My \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* shall shew \w forth|strong="H5608"\w* thy \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* \add and\add* thy \w salvation|strong="H8668"\w* all the \w day|strong="H3117"\w*; for I \w know|strong="H3045"\w* not the \w numbers|strong="H5615"\w* \add thereof\add*.

I will go \w in|strong="H0935"\w* the \w strength|strong="H1369"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*: I will make \w mention|strong="H2142"\w* of thy \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*, \add even\add* of thine only.
O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, thou hast \w taught|strong="H3925"\w* me from my \w youth|strong="H5271"\w*: and hitherto have I \w declared|strong="H5046"\w* thy wondrous \w works|strong="H6381"\w*.

Now also \w when|strong="H5704"\w* I am \w old|strong="H2209"\w* and \w grayheaded|strong="H7872"\w*, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* me not; until I have \w shewed|strong="H5046"\w* thy \w strength|strong="H2220"\w* unto \add this\add* \w generation|strong="H1755"\w*, \add and\add* thy \w power|strong="H1369"\w* to every one \add that\add* is to \w come|strong="H0935"\w*.\f + \fr 71.18 \ft when…: Heb. unto old age and gray hairs\f*\f + \fr 71.18 \ft thy strength: Heb. thine arm\f*

Thy \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* also, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \add is\add* very \w high|strong="H4791"\w*, who hast \w done|strong="H6213"\w* great \w things|strong="H1419"\w*: O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, who \add is\add* like unto thee!

\add Thou\add*, which hast \w shewed|strong="H7200"\w* me \w great|strong="H7227"\w* and \w sore|strong="H7451"\w* \w troubles|strong="H6869"\w*, shalt \w quicken|strong="H2421"\w* me \w again|strong="H7725"\w*, and shalt bring me \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w* from the \w depths|strong="H8415"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.
Thou shalt \w increase|strong="H7235"\w* my \w greatness|strong="H1420"\w*, and \w comfort|strong="H5162"\w* me on every \w side|strong="H5437"\w*.

I will also \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* thee with the \w psaltery|strong="H3627"\w*, \add even\add* thy \w truth|strong="H0571"\w*, O my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: unto thee will I \w sing|strong="H2167"\w* with the \w harp|strong="H3658"\w*, O thou Holy \w One|strong="H6918"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.\f + \fr 71.22 \ft the psaltery: Heb. the instrument of psaltery\f*
My \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* shall greatly \w rejoice|strong="H7442"\w* when I \w sing|strong="H2167"\w* unto thee; and my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, which thou hast \w redeemed|strong="H6299"\w*.

My \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* also shall \w talk|strong="H1897"\w* of thy \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* all the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* long: for they are \w confounded|strong="H0954"\w*, for they are brought unto \w shame|strong="H2659"\w*, that \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* my \w hurt|strong="H7451"\w*.
